properties.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity/Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; La Junta Vicinity/Otero County; Crowley County; Colorado Springs Vicinity/Southern El Paso County/Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity/Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 6 at 4:14PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
Snow is expected to develop this evening and into the overnight
across the I-25 corridor and further east. Generally, light snow
is expected, but we are expecting bands of heavier snow to
develop during the overnight. Areas under the snow bands will get
1 to 2 inch per hour snowfall rates and locally higher snowfall
accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. Travel will be hazardous under the
snow bands, so take caution if you need to travel late this
evening and into the overnight. Please continue to check the
updated forecast.
